From the brand

Christmas Decorations

Christmas Decorations string lights

Christmas Decorations

【Safe and Easy to Use】LED Waterfall Lights output voltage is 29V with UL Certified to ensure safety use. and this outdoor christmas decorations clearance is safe to touch and will keep at a low-temperature state after lighting up for hours. It’s very safe, power-saving, and environmentally friendly.
【8 Lights Modes & IP44 Waterproof】The fairy lights have 8 different light patterns: Combination, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/Flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/Flash, Steady on. IP44 waterproof is perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.
【Ideal Gift & Decoration Choice】 This christmas decorations outdoor yard lights can be hung on eaves, porches and trees. Widely use to hanging Christmas tree outdoor, Yards, porches, patio, garden, wall, window, bedroom, living room, wedding, party, birthday, Christmas etc.
【Timer Function & Friendly Service】Built-in timer function, Press the timer button and the indicator light on the controller will light up, which means the lights will automatically light up for 6 hours and turn off for 18 hours. We support 12 month free replacement and provide 24-hour online customer service, please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any question.

Easy to Use

The christmas tree decorations lights have two control ways, which is the mode button of the plug and the remote control. You can adjust the brightness from 100%, 75%, 50%, 25%. According to your actual needs choose the comfortable brightness. It can create a romatic atmosphere for your life.

Low Voltage & UL Certification

This Christmas lights use 29V safety low voltage , which strictly tested and meets the US requirements of string lights UL safety standards, More safety and less power consumption. No danger of electric shock, lower than standard body safe voltage 36V.

Outdoor Waterproof Designed

The high waterproof rating and strong construction is durable enough to stand complex climates, ideal for home decor, holiday outdoor decorations, garden decor for outside, new year decorations and can work normally even in cold winter.

Solar Powered LED Christmas String Lights Outdoor Indoor Decoration

  • Christmas Wide Angle LED String Lights – Light Up Your Life

5MM led string lights surface is wide angle concave lens, with multi-angle light source, more dispersed and clear than other shapes of light, radiating a halo of light in all directions, shining but not too dazzling.

  • Extra Long Christmas String Lights

100Ft extra long outdoor wide angle string lights with 300 high quality LED, mini beads sealed against moisture, eliminate corrosion. Maximize the durability and practicality of the string lights.

  • Energy Efficient

High-quality solar panels can store a lot of electricity, and the high-bright LED light saves more energy than traditional decorative light sections, with a bulb life of up to 5,000 hours.

Auto ON/OFF Solar Lights String

  • Higher Solar Conversion
  • 6-8 hours auto charge during the day
  • Longer Working Time
  1. Auto light up for 8-12 hours when motion is detected at night
  2. Ensure that the solar panels are directly exposed to sunlight to complete the conversion of light energy into electricity.
  • Note:
  1. Please turn on the lights when charging and the light will not be on when the solar panel is absorbing solar energy.L
  2. ight sensor control, it only lights in certain dim environments or darker. But it will light as the panel covered even in daytime.

All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:13:44 UTC – Details)



[More Efficient & Safer Light Sensors]-We use a more advanced monocrystalline solar panel and have upgraded its size. It can now receive, store and release solar energy more efficiently, dramatically increasing the solar energy conversion rate, meaning shorter charging times and longer lighting times. All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether it is raining, foggy or snowing can be used outdoors. Usually it can work up to 10-12 hours after 4-6 hours of charging in direct sunlight.
[Variable Lighting Modes to Create Various Ambiance]-The solar starlight light has 8 different lighting modes that can be adjusted by the ‘mode’ button behind the solar panel. And the built-in memory chip with memory function, every time you turn it on or when the night comes, it will automatically adopt the mode set for you last time. You can adjust to the most suitable lighting mode according to the need for decoration or different situations.
[Extra-Long & Widely Used Outdoor/Indoor String Lights]-The solar LED string lights are 66FT long, the spacing of LED beads is 10cm, and the lead length is 6FT, which can be easily installed in the place where decoration is needed. It can be molded into various shapes for gardens, courtyards, trees, porches, roofs, fences bistros, restaurants, hotels, commercial buildings. It can also be used in weddings, parties, Christmas, New Year parties to create a warm, joyful and festive ambiance.
[Be The Most Responsible Seller]-We are committed to provide you with high quality products. If you encounter any problem in the process of using solar string lights, please feel free to contact us, we will provide 7*24 hours technical service, you just need to send an email to the buyer center, we will reply within 8 hours.NOTE: It will automatically charge and light up at night when the switch behind the solar panel is turned on.

(as of Nov 30,2022 08:13:44 UTC – Details)

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine’s Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

—Super Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

—8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

— 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

—Timer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

—Memory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

—Safe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

—IP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

【Warm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control】Including (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. 【IP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS】Perfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
【4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function】Our Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
【Safety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape】UL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
【What You Get & Quality Assurance】1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don’t hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

Super long 1000 LED Christmas String Lights

item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:18 UTC – Details)



【Waterproof and Durable Upgrade】Ollny Christmas outdoor lights are made of 3 layers of transparent PVC wire, more resistant to pulling and tearing; The light beads are wrapped with waterproof material, IP67 waterproof. These outside Christmas lights can work stably no matter what the weather.
【Remote Control-Multi Function】Ollny Christmas fairy lights can be remotely controlled: ① 8 lighting modes; ② memory function and 3 timer functions; ③ 4 levels of dimming: 100%-75%-50%-25%. Just press the remote control to create the holiday atmosphere of your dreams.
【Safety Christmas Lights Indoor】Ollny 29V Safety Low Voltage Multicolor Led Christmas Lights have passed the authoritative UL588 safety certification and are perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, these outdoor string lights are easy to install. Perfect for Christmas, Yard, Patio, Garden, Parties, Weddings and Thanksgiving Create a unique and surprising seasonal look.
【What you get】-1x 900 LED Christmas string lights;1 x storage reelP; 1 x remote control; 1 x controller box; 1 x UL listed plug; 1 x user manual. If you have any problems or encounter malfunction issues, please contact Ollny after-sales service and we will help you return the product or refund.
